name: Samozbor: Rebellion
description: Fleeting kinematic novel about tea party. How does it ends with appearance of the cursed castle? Hidden gem from russian visual novels is here to enrich your cultural statement.
minimum_requirements: Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Storage: 60 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Processor: 3 GHz Memory: 2048 MB RAM Storage: 60 MB available space
